name: R-Type Reloaded
overview:
R-Type Reloaded is an unofficial, rewritten version of the commercial game of the same name, with many enhancements including music, improved graphics, faster scrolling, a built-in cheat mode, and additional playing options. Includes 3" and 3 1/2" disc versions. High scores are saved to disc.

Easter Egg made the source code for R-type Reloaded available to the public!
